products.name: ACH & Wire Transfers
products.summary: Efficiently send and receive electronic payments.
products.details:
• Automated Clearing House (ACH): Ideal for direct deposit, vendor payments, and tax payments. Lower cost than wires.
  • Wire Transfers: For high-value, time-sensitive domestic and international payments.

products.summary: Streamline purchasing and payables with a robust card program.
